lego-box.name: Batcave
lego-box.description: Pay homage to the iconic Caped Crusader and his pursuits against crime with the LEGO DC Batman™ Batcave set. Fans of the Dark Knight can recreate their favorite moments and dive into a world of adventure with this impressive build, filled with exciting role play adventures and authentically detailed vehicles.

lego-box.name: Statue of Liberty
lego-box.description: Celebrate a monumental blend of architecture and sculpture with this LEGO Architecture Statue of Liberty set. America’s iconic symbol of freedom, the Statue of Liberty was designed by French sculptor Frédéric Auguste Bartholdi and dedicated in 1886. The beautifully crafted Lady Liberty stands tall, holding a torch and tablet, inscribed with the date of the American Declaration of Independence. This elegant and detailed model features an intricately detailed pedestal, brick-built shield, and beautifully detailed crown, robe, and flowing drape. With its authentic architecture, this LEGO set is a wonderful display piece for the home or office.
